sourcesContent:
const eventOptions = [
    { value: 'clickHomepage', label: 'clickHomepage' },
    { value: 'feed_screen_launched', label: 'feed_screen_launched' },
    { value: 'favorite_screen_launched', label: 'favorite_screen_launched' },
    { value: 'category_screen_launched', label: 'category_screen_launched' },
    { value: 'clickCategoryPage', label: 'clickCategoryPage' },
    { value: 'product_page_opened', label: 'product_page_opened' },
    { value: 'viewProduct', label: 'viewProduct' },
    { value: 'UserLogin', label: 'UserLogin' },
    { value: 'registration_start', label: 'registration_start' },
    { value: 'RegistrationStart', label: 'RegistrationStart' },
]
const attributeNames = [
    { value: 'product_removed_from_cart', label: 'product_removed_from_cart' },
    { value: 'addToCart', label: 'addToCart' },
    { value: 'ClickCheckout', label: 'ClickCheckout' },
    { value: 'device_model', label: 'device_model' },
    { value: 'device_manufacturer', label: 'device_manufacturer' },
    { value: 'sdk_version', label: 'sdk_version' },
    { value: 'platform', label: 'platform' },
    { value: 'app_version', label: 'app_version' },
    { value: 'uninstall_time', label: 'uninstall_time' },
    { value: 'install_status', label: 'install_status' },
    { value: 'install_status', label: 'install_status' },
    { value: 'last_known_state', label: 'last_known_state' },
    { value: 'last_known_pincode', label: 'last_known_pincode' },
    { value: 'last_known_city', label: 'last_known_city' },
    { value: 'unsubscribe', label: 'unsubscribe' },
    { value: 'merchant_topads_amount', label: 'hardmerchant_topads_amount_bounce' },
    { value: 'merchant_topads_amount_formatted', label: 'merchant_topads_amount_formatted' },
    { value: 'first_transaction_marketplace', label: 'first_transaction_marketplace' },
    { value: 'first_transaction_digital', label: 'first_transaction_digital' },
    { value: 'purchased_marketplace', label: 'purchased_marketplace' },
    { value: 'purchased_digital', label: 'purchased_digital' },
]
gender
transaction_city
transaction_province
wallet_amount
saldo_amount
user_name
first_name
email
mobile
merchant_is_gold
date_of_birth
registration_date

const operators = [
    { value: '>', label: '>' },
    { value: '<', label: '<' },
    { value: '=', label: '=' },
    { value: '>=', label: '>=' },
    { value: '<=', label: '<=' },
]

const eventValues = [
    { value: 'Value1', label: 'Value1' },
    { value: 'Value2', label: 'Value2' },
    { value: 'Value3', label: 'Value3' },
]

const times = [
    { value: 'min', label: 'min' },
    { value: 'hour', label: 'hour' },
    { value: 'day', label: 'day' },
]
const conditions = [{ value: 'after', label: 'After' }, { value: 'before', label: 'Before' }]
const eventDid = [{ value: 'did', label: 'did' }, { value: 'did not', label: 'did not' }]
const occures = [
    { value: 'atleast', label: 'atleast' },
    { value: 'atmost', label: 'atmost' },
    { value: 'equal', label: 'equal' },
]

export default {
    eventOptions,
    attributeNames,
    operators,
    eventValues,
    times,
    conditions,
    eventDid,
    occures,
    primaryAction: {
        event: '',
        maxSections: 5,
        attributeSection: [
            {
                attributeName: '',
                operator: '',
                value: '',
            },
        ],
    },
    maxSecondaryActions: 4,
    secondaryAction: [
        {
            eventDid: eventDid[0].value,
            event: '',
            occure: occures[0].value,
            times: 1,
            maxSections: 5,
            attributeSection: [
                {
                    attributeName: '',
                    operator: '',
                    value: '',
                },
            ],
        },
    ],
    when: 'primaryAction',
    wait: {
        times: 30,
        unit: times[0].value,
        occure: conditions[0].value,
        action: 'primaryAction',
        primaryActionProperty: '',
    },
}
